    A small collection of useful helper methods.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.io.File source,
        java.io.File sink)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copies source to sink. Both files must exist beforehand.
        Parameters:
        source - data to copy
        sink - file to copy to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if copy operation failed

      • isSubdirectory

        public static boolean isSubdirectory(java.io.File ancestor,
                     java.io.File subdirectory)
        Returns true if the second directory argument is indeed a subdirectory of the first directory argument. Returns allways true if ancestor is null. Returns allways false if subdirectory is null.
        Parameters:
        ancestor - base directory
        subdirectory - to be tested
        Returns:
        true if "ancestor" is indeed an ancestor directory of "subdirectory"

      • getRelativePath

        public static java.lang.String getRelativePath(java.lang.String base,
                               java.lang.String fullPath)
        Returns fullPath relative to base if base is indeed a sudirectory of fullpath. Returns fullPath unchanged othewise.
        Parameters:
        base - base directory
        fullPath - to be expressed as a relative path
        Returns:
        relative path if base is a subdirectory of fullpath
